messages.title: Labour will put people before privilege
messages.content: Britain is at a crossroads. The choice at the coming election is clear.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Take the decision back to the people with the choice of a credible Leave offer or Remain.
Attract businesses, creating jobs and equipping people with the skills to succeed.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Kick start a green industrial revolution
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Tackle the climate emergency and create high skilled, high wage jobs.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Build a country that rewards workers

keyPolicies.policyDescription: World class public services run for people not profit.

issues.brexitEurope: End the Brexit crisis by taking the decision back to the people with the choice of a credible Leave offer or Remain.
issues.economy: Invest in every community, attracting businesses, giving people the skills to succeed.
issues.environment: Kick start a green industrial revolution to tackle the climate emergency.
issues.labourEmployment: Build a country that rewards workers not just the very richest.

community.content: Deliver properly funded public services: world class public services run for people not profit.

examples: Britain is at a crossroads. The choice at the coming election is clear.
Invest in every community, attracting businesses, giving people the skills to succeed.
End the Brexit crisis by taking the decision back to the people with the choice of a credible Leave offer or Remain.
Invest in every community, attracting businesses, giving people the skills to succeed.
Kick start a green industrial revolution to tackle the climate emergency.
Build a country that rewards workers not just the very richest.
Deliver properly funded public services: world class public services run for people not profit.
The Tories are in chaos and our country is in crisis.
Boris Johnson’s Conservatives want to drive our country over a cliff edge.
His reckless Brexit deal will take us towards a future dictated by Donald Trump.
